name: Cucumbers In Sour Cream
instructions: Mix all ingredients except cucumbers. Chill. If more spicy taste is desired, add more vinegar, mustard, etc. Wash 2 cucumbers; cut off ends to seeds and slice in about 1/4-inch slices; pour sour cream dressing over cucumbers. Let marinate. Keep chilled and turn a couple of times. Makes a little over 1 cup. Serve on coleslaw or vegetable salad.
